title: The plot on which a petrol filling station with or without service bays is proposed shall be an independent plot on which no other structure shall be constructed
clause_text: The plot on which a petrol filling station with or without service bays is proposed shall be an independent plot on which no other structure shall be constructed.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
